definition.text: Sorry for dragging you away from the charts, but I wanted to introduce you to someone: the guy on the right is the one placing the buy orders!

paragraphs.text: We are inside the Lightning Strike Trading System, within the definitions of the Open Stage. In this stage, the Execution Algorithm takes over after the decision to take a position has already been made on the Trigger Stage. I know you still don't know what a Situation or a Condition are, but I'd still like you to do something...
Take a few minutes to explore the nodes below the execution algorithm, check the formulas and conditions, and see what you can make of them!
